name: Robot Boy goes to Phone Factory
name_original: Robot Boy goes to Phone Factory
description:
Hello mister Robot-san,

Welcome back to the phone answering factory.

Where it is your job to answer the phones .

Please answers as many phones as you can before you run out of power-desu.

**[Answer Left Phone with LMB and Right Phone with RMB]**

Try and reach that high score!


Make the company proud!

Created by Monea Games

(Made in a single day)
